required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Assess the Safety and Efficacy of CsA Ophthalmic Gel in Subjects With Moderate to Severe Dry Eye Disease
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 3, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Vehicle-controlled Efficacy and Safety Study of CsA Ophthalmic Gel in Subjects With Moderate to Severe Dry Eye Disease

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to explore the efficacy and safety of CsA ophthalmic gel in the treatment of moderate to severe dry eye disease .

detailed_description.textblock: A multicenter,randomized, double-blind, vehicle-controlled Study.Subjects will be randomly assigned to the experimental group and the control group,experimental group: CsA eye gel: 0.3 g: 0.15 mg, once daily;One drop into each eye when you use it.hypromellose eye drops:10ml：50mg,three times a day Control group: vehicle. One drop into the eye, once daily;One drop into each eye when you use it.hypromellose eye drops:10ml：50mg,three times a day

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients whose corneal fluorescein staining score (ICSS) decreased by ≥1 point from baseline at visit 5 (study eye)
primary_outcome.description: ICSS：no staining = 0，few/rare punctate lesions = 1，discrete and countable lesions = 2，lesions too numerous to count，but not coalescent = 3，coalescent = 4

secondary_outcome.measure: EDS score at the NO.3, NO.4 and NO.5 visit was compared with the baseline EDS score (binocular)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 14 days after admission ，42 days after admission ，84days days after admission

secondary_outcome.measure: Average changes in VAS scores of 6 dry eye symptoms (burning/needling sensation, pruritus, foreign body sensation, discomfort, photophobia and pain) at the NO.3, NO.4 and NO.5 visit were compared with baseline (binocular)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 14 days after admission ，42 days after admission ，84days days after admission

secondary_outcome.measure: corneal fluorescein staining score (ICSS)at the NO.3, NO.4 and NO.5 visit was compared with the baseline (binocular)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 14 days after admission ，42 days after admission ，84days days after admission
secondary_outcome.description: ICSS：no staining = 0，few/rare punctate lesions = 1，discrete and countable lesions = 2，lesions too numerous to count，but not coalescent = 3，coalescent = 4

secondary_outcome.measure: oxford score at the NO.3, NO.4 and NO.5 visit was compared with the baseline (binocular)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 14 days after admission ，42 days after admission ，84days days after admission

secondary_outcome.measure: BUT at the NO.3, NO.4 and NO.5 visit was compared with the baseline (binocular)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 14 days after admission ，42 days after admission ，84days days after admission

secondary_outcome.measure: Schirmer at the NO.3, NO.4 and NO.5 visit was compared with the baseline (binocular)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 14 days after admission ，42 days after admission ，84days days after admission

arm_group.description: 322 subjects will be treated with CsA eye gel: 0.3 g: 0.15 mg, 1 times daily, The treatment period is 12 weeks. The basic medicine is Hypromellose Eye Drops, 3 times daily for 12 weeks.
322 subjects will be treated with Placebo : 0 g: 0mg, 1 times daily, The treatment period is 12 weeks. The basic medicine is Hypromellose Eye Drops, 3 times daily for 12 weeks.

intervention.description: The CsA eye gel of 0.3 g: 0.15 mg
Hypromellose Eye Drops of 10ml：50mg, 3 times daily, 1-2 drop
